thread.section_title: The Bryant Park Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fabulous experience !!
thread.title_full: Fabulous experience !! - Review of The Bryant Park Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sasha526
title: Fabulous experience !!
text:
I had a wonderful experience at The Bryant Park Hotel. We needed a hotel for Sunday evening in March. I know the reputation is very good but as a guest , it was sensational.
My 13 year old ( who loves a good hotel ) was in awe of the friendly staff, cool red elevators with great music and an overall terrific vibe. We initially had a lovely room with an interior view. When I asked if there was another option, we were able to move to a room with a view. Miguel and Sharon at the front desk were extremely accommodating. They made us feel very welcome. The room was , well designed, crisp and clean and the bathroom was amazing . We didn't want to leave. I look forward to our next visit and will highly recommend this hotel. Great staff and management is as important as the accommodations. Here , you get the entire package.
